introduction: The true story of the Indies Trader and the men behind modern surfi g. When surfing pioneers Martin Daly and Dave Burnett discovered the best waves in Bali and Indonesia in the 1970's they were aboard the Indie Trader. This beautiful boat also bore these modern day pirates on the smuggling missions they used to fund their passion. Now members of the surfing establishment, these free-spirited men and their boat take surfing's hottest talent out to discover unchartered waves. Their mission, these days sponsored by Quicksilver, is to record unchartered waters so protecting them for future generations of sportsmen. This film charts the story of a dynamic mix of unique and roguish men the women who loved them,and the sport that changed their lives.
